reference.title: Import Entries dialog
reference.shortdesc: Allows you to import into a keystore selected entries (keys) from another keystore.

section.p: This dialog is displayed when you click (Import Entries) in the Signing and Keys view.

strow.stentry: Path to the keystore file containing one or more keys to be imported.
The password controls provides access to the contents of the source keystore.
Loads the contents of the source keystore and displays its contents in the list box in the center of the dialog.
List of possible keystore entries for importation. Select those that should be imported.
The keystore to which the imported entries are to be added.
